description: A brand new program which turns your Windows machine into a Mac. With the power of freetype, it can render your Windows fonts smoothly and much more conveniently to read. This program is re-developed from GDI++, a Japanese project which is no longer being updated. MacType is now more powerful than GDI++. It supports Chrome 18+, GTK and even Safari.
summary: The ultimate font rasterizer for Windows
author: Flying Snow
